resources.string:
Devils with halos have all the angels hypnotized
Black tears rolling down a pale chin underneath eyes wide open
Subdued by some words from a tongue
Let loose by a liar like fire from the sun
Run but you can’t hide
Open wide come inside
Wild eyes in a trance We can watch ‘em dance until they bleed
Wild eyes in a trance We can dance until we see
Mirrors don’t lie I know time goes so slow
In a trance we can dance until we see
Angels with whips and chains have all the demons begging for pain
Rain it on me till I can’t see! They plea and they plea
How does it feel to be above me?
I know you hate to love me
Just tell the truth cause I know you won’t lie, so don’t deny
Wild Eyes
Devils with halos have all the angels hypnotized
Black tears rolling down a pale chin underneath eyes wide open
Subdued by some words from a tongue
Let loose by a liar like fire from the sun
Run but you can’t hide
Open wide come inside
Wild eyes in a trance We can watch ‘em dance until they bleed

Mirrors don’t lie I know time goes so slow
In a trance we can dance until we see
Angels with whips and chains have all the demons begging for pain
Rain it on me till I can’t see! They plea and they plea
How does it feel to be above me?
I know you hate to love me
Just tell the truth cause I know you won’t lie, so don’t deny
Wild Eyes
